Plot: When Zoe inherits the magical protection of a bewitched Gnome, she quickly realizes that he isn't your garden variety gnome, when he begins eliminating her enemies in extravagant displays of revenge.
Title: Gnome Alone
Writer: Lauren De Normandie (re-written by), John Michael Elfers (additional scenes), Glenn Ennis
Director: Timothy Woodward Jr., John Michael Elfers
Actors: Verne Troyer, Kerry Knuppe, Bill Oberst Jr., Marlon Young
